languages.text: "Верно. Человек и дитя Азуриана... Мы будем биться бок о бок, словно пара клинков, и враги не устоят перед нашей яростью".
"True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."
languages.original_text: "Верно. Человек и дитя Азуриана... Мы будем биться бок о бок, словно пара клинков, и враги не устоят перед нашей яростью".

traits.locale_text: "True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."
"True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."
"True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."
"True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."
"True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."

languages.text: “确实如此，人类与阿苏焉之子……我们会像两把利刃一样并肩作战，所有敌人都会在我们的怒火面前倒下。”
languages.original_text: "True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，人类与阿苏焉之子……我们会像两把利刃一样并肩作战，所有敌人都会在我们的怒火面前倒下。”

languages.text: «Cierto. Un{mf||a} human{mf|o|a} y una Hija de Asuryan... Lucharemos hombro con hombro como dos espadas gemelas, y los enemigos caerán ante nuestra furia».
languages.original_text: "True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."

traits.locale_text: «Cierto. Un{mf||a} human{mf|o|a} y una Hija de Asuryan... Lucharemos hombro con hombro como dos espadas gemelas, y los enemigos caerán ante nuestra furia».

languages.text: 「その通り。人間とアシュリアンの御子...私たちは一対の刃のように並んで戦い、その怒りの前に敵は倒れるだろう」
languages.original_text: "True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."

traits.locale_text: 「その通り。人間とアシュリアンの御子...私たちは一対の刃のように並んで戦い、その怒りの前に敵は倒れるだろう」

languages.text: "Stimmt. Ein Mensch und ein Kind von Asuryan ... Wir werden Seite an Seite wie kämpfen wie ein Paar Klingen, und die Feinde werden vor unserem Zorn zu Boden gehen."
languages.original_text: "True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."

traits.locale_text: "Stimmt. Ein Mensch und ein Kind von Asuryan ... Wir werden Seite an Seite wie kämpfen wie ein Paar Klingen, und die Feinde werden vor unserem Zorn zu Boden gehen."

languages.text: « En effet. {mf|Un humain|Une humaine} et une enfant d'Asuryan... Nous nous battrons côte à côte telles des lames jumelles, et nos ennemis tomberont devant notre fureur. »
languages.original_text: "True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. {mf|Un humain|Une humaine} et une enfant d'Asuryan... Nous nous battrons côte à côte telles des lames jumelles, et nos ennemis tomberont devant notre fureur. »

languages.text: "Doğru. Bir insan ile bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu... Bir çift kılıç gibi yan yana savaşacağız, düşmanlarımız da öfkemiz karşısında yerle yeksan olacak."
languages.original_text: "True. A human and a Child of Asuryan... We will fight side by side like a pair of blades, and the enemies will fall before our fury."
